com.axelor.studio.service

Class ChartRecorderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ChartRecorderService

  • public class ChartRecorderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generate charts using ViewEditor and chart related fields. Chart xml generated by adding query, search fields , onInit actions..etc. All filters with parameter checked will be used as search fields. Tags also there to use context variable in filter value, like $User for current user (__user__).

      • prepareQuery

        private java.lang.String[] prepareQuery(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        Method create query from chart filters added in chart editor.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor of type chart
        Returns:
        StringArray with first element as query string and second as aggregate field name.

      • getGroupFieldName

        private java.lang.String getGroupFieldName(MetaField metaField,
                                 java.lang.String dateType)
        Method to get correct format of group field use to add in query
        Parameters:
        metaField - Group field name selected in chart editor.
        dateType - Type of date (month,year,day) selected for group field.
        Returns:
        Group field string.

        String condition

      • getM2MCondition

        private java.lang.String getM2MCondition(java.lang.String field,
                               java.lang.String[] nameColumn,
                               java.lang.String value,
                               boolean like,
                               boolean notTag)
        Method to get condition for chart filter with M2M field
        Parameters:
        field - M2M field name
        nameColumn - Array of string with first element as nameColumn field name and second as its type.
        value - Value of M2M field
        like - boolean to check if its like or non like condition.
        notTag - boolean to check if tag used in value.
        Returns:
        String condition

      • getQuotedString

        private java.lang.String getQuotedString(java.lang.String inputStr,
                               boolean lower)
        Method to get single quoted string with optional lower function.
        Parameters:
        inputStr - Input string
        lower - boolean to check if 'lower' function to add for a string
        Returns:
        Quoted string

      • getNameColumn

        private java.lang.String[] getNameColumn(MetaField metaField)
        Method to get name column for relational field, as it is required to compare in chart filters.
        Parameters:
        metaField - Relational meta field.
        Returns:
        String array with first element as nameColumn and second as type of nameColumn.

      • getTagValue

        private java.lang.String getTagValue(java.lang.String value)
        It will return value of tag used in chart filter 'value'.
        Parameters:
        value - Value of chart filter.
        Returns:
        Contex variable to use instead of tag.

      • setDefaultValue

        private void setDefaultValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                   java.lang.String typeName,
                   java.lang.String defaultValue,
                   java.lang.String[] modelField)
        Method set default value for search-fields(parameters). It will add field and expression in onNew for chart.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of field of search-field.
        typeName - Type of field.
        defaultValue - Default value input in chart filter.
        modelField - It is for relational field. String array with first element as Model name and second as its nameColumn.

      • setOnNewAction

        private void setOnNewAction(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        It will create onNew action from onNew fields.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor use to get model name also used in onNew action name creation.

      • getLikeCondition

        private java.lang.String getLikeCondition(java.lang.String conditionField,
                                java.lang.String value,
                                boolean isLike)
        Method create like condition for chart filter with string field. Also it add LOWER function condition.
        Parameters:
        conditionField - Chart filter field name
        value - Value of input in chart filter.
        isLike - boolean to check if condition is like or notLike
        Returns:
        String condition.
